var express=require('express');var app=express();app.use(express.static("public"));app.set('view engine','ejs');app.set("views","./views");app.listen(8888,function(){console.log("đã mở cổng");});// All router
app.get('/',function(req,res){res.render('index');});app.get('/about',function(req,res){res.render('about');});
